title: Can anyone name this font
content:
Hello,  
I am desperate to know what this font is, but I only have one letter!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150423195212im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-06-06%20at%203_5227.38.29%20PM.png)
author: acomaroma3

comments.content:
It looks quite a bit like like English Grotesque Thin

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/english-grotesque/thin/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150423195212/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/english-grotesque/thin/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/english-grotesque/thin/")
